title: The Ice Kiss
description: He’s the new hockey team captainAlso my roommateAnd now my fake fiancé...When I discover my boyfriend is cheating on me, I quit my job, and move to take up a role as the PR manager for a hockey team.Only problem? There’s a mix up.Now I’m stuck sharing a flat with the grumpy, hockey captain.Worse? (or is that better?) there’s only one bed!Even worse? My ex too has moved, as the captain of the rival team, ugh!When my roomie realizes how much I want revenge he comes up with a plan.He asks me to pose as his fake fiancée on his trip home.In return I get to be seen with him, and show up my ex.I’ve sworn off men, there’s no way I can fall for him.But what happens when sparks fly?This is a standalone roommates to lovers, fake relationship, one-bed, hockey romance with a possessive hero, a woman who doesn't hesitate to go toe-to-toe with him, and a champagne guzzling Great Dane who plays matchmaker by mistake. HEA guaranteed.This book will release late August.
author: L. Steele
